name: In the City at Night
description:
This is not a game for all, but for you. It’s raw. There is no padding the rough edges and no polish to cover up the cracks. A tale of a certain time in life and for stone cold teenagers (at heart).

Based on a shortstory from back when life looked pretty bleak.

Topics include: loneliness, desperation, anxiety, depression and suicide. #AdvJam2019 #pointnclick #visualnovel #ITCAN #unpolished #comingofage #melancholic #narrative #interactivestory
